Description.Name: AC/2 Ammo (Containment)
Description.Details: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and damage their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit. Containment AC/2 Ammo Bins are reinforced to contain half of the destructive force when an ammunition explosion occurs, but contain only 32 rounds of ammunition per ton. Explosion damage per ammo: 0.3
